RelatedSentence: Mining giant Rio Tinto expects to sign an agreement to push ahead with the troubled $ US20 billion ( $ A21.64 billion ) Simandou iron ore project in Guinea .
Mining giant Rio Tinto expects to sign an agreement to push ahead with the troubled $ US20 billion ( $ A21.64 billion ) Simandou iron ore project in Guinea .
